alert.note: Alert for Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 05 at 2:34PM AKDT until November 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING TO 9 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations up to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. * WHEN...From 10 PM AKDT this evening to 9 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility down to one quarter mile or less at times. Strong winds could damage buildings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will be north of Noatak.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult.
